name: Emergency in Section C
description:
EMERGENCY. EMERGENCY. EMERGENCY. THERE IS AN EMERGENCY IN SECTION C. 

A mistake has been made in Section C, and you must evacuate your post and get to safety. Navigate your way through the complex labyrinth of the space station and quickly make your escape. Preferably while still alive.

This game was made for the May Day Make-a-Level game jam https://itch.io/jam/make-a-level-may in an extended week jam. The theme was "Emergency."

Controls:
WASD, arrow keys - Movement, look up/down
Space - Jump
Gamepad support included.
